column1: When gods and shepherds piped and the stars sang
column2: that was the day of musicians! But the triumph of Phœbus Apollo himself was not so wonderful as the triumph of a mortal man who lived on earth
column3: though some say that he came of divine lineage. This was Orpheus
column5: who went with the Grecian heroes of the great ship Argo in search of the Golden Fleece.After his return from the quest
column6: he won Eurydice for his wife
column7: and they were as happy as people can be who love each other and every one else. The very wild beasts loved them
column8: and the trees clustered about their home as if they were watered with music. But even the gods themselves were not always free from sorrow
column9: and one day misfortune came upon that harper Orpheus whom all men loved to honor.
